data.Name: Rising Appalachia
data.Bio: Rising Appalachia is an American musical group led by multi-instrumentalist sisters Leah Smith and Chloe Smith. The group brings to the world new sounds, stories, and songs collected across oceans and originally sculpted to embody our human journey, our global community, and the treasures and troves of soul harmony. Listen to their beautiful sound for poetic harmonies, soul singing, spoken word rallies, banjos, fiddles, organic bass and groove rhythms, and community building through SOUND. Read more on Last.fm
